医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
医疗保健领域的人工智能在试验中显示出前景，但需要实际测试以确保有效性《柳叶刀数字健康》发表的一项综合研究分析了人工智能在临床环境中的功效和挑战，揭示了对现实世界测试和多样化研究方法的迫切需求，以确保人工智能可靠地融入医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/AI-in-healthcare-shows-promise-in-trials-but-needs-real-world-testing-to-ensure-efficientness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/AI-in-healthcare-shows-promise-in-trials-but-needs-real-world-testing-to-ensure- effectiveness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4884a77-ec42-4879-a37e-02b55d1b1d1c Thu, 25 Apr 2024 23:57:00 -0400 AI in healthcare shows promise in trials but needs real-world testing to ensure effectiveness
女性维生素 D 含量低与腹部脂肪和肌肉无力有关女性维生素 D 含量低与腹部脂肪较多和肌肉质量较低有关。该研究建议使用腰围与身高的比率和肌肉质量指数来评估健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Low-vitamin-D-tied-to-belly-fat-and-weak-muscles-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Low-vitamin-D-tied-to-belly-fat-and-weak-muscles-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10d3fe54-b53c-4edd-ad6d-0d33f96ea847 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 23:38:00 -0400 Low vitamin D tied to belly fat and weak muscles in women
食品添加剂乳化剂与 2 型糖尿病风险增加有关研究发现，食用某些食品乳化剂与 2 型糖尿病的较高风险之间存在联系。乳化剂在加工食品中很常见，可能会破坏肠道健康，可能导致糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Food-additive-emulsifiers-linked-to-increased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Food-additive-emulsifiers-linked-to-increased-risk-of-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04334158-9612-42b6-81df-c25323100380 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 23:19:00 -0400 Food additive emulsifiers linked to increased risk of type 2 diabetes
研究表明，组织中挥之不去的冠状病毒可能会导致长期的新冠症状研究调查了 SARS-CoV-2 在 COVID-19 康复后是否会残留在组织中，以及它是否与长期的新冠症状有关。他们在多个器官中发现了病毒 RNA，其存在与长期的新冠症状相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Study-suggests-lingering-coronavirus-in-tissues-may-contribute-to-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Study-suggests-lingering-coronavirus-in-tissues-may-contribute-to-long-COVID-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8868d47-d4aa-40f3-9761-341d80260fec Thu, 25 Apr 2024 23:10:00 -0400 Study suggests lingering coronavirus in tissues may contribute to long COVID symptoms
体型如何影响结直肠癌风险研究表明，特定的体型表型，例如全身性肥胖和向心性肥胖，会显着增加患结直肠癌的风险，这表明不同肥胖亚型存在不同的分子途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/How-body-shape-in​​fluences-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/How-body-shape-in​​fluences-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc4d09af-504b-4c1d-a857-a18b45892fb6 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 22:52:00 -0400 How body shape influences colorectal cancer risk
研究发现良好的睡眠模式可降低患心脏病的风险持续良好的睡眠模式可以降低患心血管疾病的风险，即使对于具有较高遗传易感性的个体也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Good-sleep-patterns-cut-heart-disease-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Good-sleep-patterns-cut-heart-disease-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c600b83-2dd2-4a3e-b246-4cf93c0ef559 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Good sleep patterns cut heart disease risk, study finds
癌症史会增加高血压患者患心血管疾病的风险研究表明，患有高血压和癌症病史的人患心血管疾病的风险增加，其中接受化疗的人面临的风险最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Cancer-history-raises-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-hypertential-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Cancer-history-raises-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-hypertective-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=794b3631-3daf-41dc-9a34-959282dfbfbe Thu, 25 Apr 2024 19:50:00 -0400 Cancer history raises cardiovascular disease risk in hypertensive patients
饮食对肠道细菌的影响为帕金森病的治疗提供了新线索研究人员发现，饮食显着影响帕金森病患者的肠道微生物组，可能影响疾病进展和症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Diets-impact-on-gut-bacteria-offers-new-clues-in-Parkinsons-disease-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Diets-impact-on-gut-bacteria-offers-new-clues-in-Parkinsons-disease-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46f955bd-4ce3-4398-8279-07e2703b426a Thu, 25 Apr 2024 19:35:00 -0400 Diet's impact on gut bacteria offers new clues in Parkinson's disease management
将病原体基因组监测置于未来大流行防范的最前沿Covid-19 大流行使世界发生了翻天覆地的变化。在对抗病毒的过程中，我们最重要的武器之一是基于全基因组测序的基因组监视，它收集特定微生物的所有遗传数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Putting-genomic-surveillance-of-pathogens-at-the-forefront-of-future-pandemic-preparedness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Putting-genomic-surveillance-of-pathogens-at-the-forefront-of-future-pandemic-preparedness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52f16d32-2c33-4ca6-b304-ddaf918a4d74 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 13:38:00 -0400 Putting genomic surveillance of pathogens at the forefront of future pandemic preparedness
研究表明患有心脏病的女性治疗不足根据今天在欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 科学大会 ESC 预防心脏病学 2024 上发表的研究，患有心脏病的女性比男性更少接受降胆固醇药物治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Research-reveals-undertreatment-of-women-with-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240425/Research-reveals-undertreatment-of-women-with-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcc16ff4-a23e-48ab-846a-d38b2e89dc03 Thu, 25 Apr 2024 13:21:59 -0400 Research reveals undertreatment of women with heart disease
